comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: A photo of a seemingly non-descript four-stack destroyer USS Buchanan (DD-131). However, USS Buchanan, as the HMS Campbeltown, would go on to be sacrificed as a ship bomb (for lack of a better term) in one of the most daring and important raids of World War II, the Saint-Nazaire Raid of March 1942. See: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/St._Nazaire_Raid Documentary - "The Greatest Raid of All" ( www.youtube.com/watch?v=axHjSxFyfuo ) Photo credit: Wikipedia Commons
